name: tm78
effect: Teaches Captivate to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Bulldoze to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Captivate)

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
If it is the opposite gender of the
user, the foe is charmed into sharply
lowering its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
If it is the opposite gender of the
user, the foe is charmed into sharply
lowering its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
If it is the opposite gender of the
user, the foe is charmed into sharply
lowering its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user stomps down on the ground
and attacks everything in the area.
The targets’ Speed stat is reduced.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user stomps down on the ground
and attacks everything in the area.
The targets’ Speed stat is reduced.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user strikes everything around it
by stomping down on the ground.
This lowers the Speed stat of those hit.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user strikes everything around it by stomping
down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of
those hit.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user strikes everything around it by stomping
down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of
those hit.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user strikes everything around it by stomping
down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of
those hit.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not
holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.
